members.name: getLineNumber
members.comment: Return the line number where the current event ends, returns -1 if none is available.

members.name: getColumnNumber
members.comment: Return the column number where the current event ends, returns -1 if none is available.

members.name: getCharacterOffset
members.comment: Return the byte or character offset into the input source this location is pointing to. If the input source is a file or a byte stream then this is the byte offset into that stream, but if the input source is a character media then the offset is the character offset. Returns -1 if there is no offset available.

members.name: getPublicId
members.comment: Returns the public ID of the XML

return: the public ID, or null if not available

members.name: getSystemId
members.comment: Returns the system ID of the XML

return: the system ID, or null if not available

name: javax.xml.stream.Location
comment: Provides information on the location of an event. All the information provided by a Location is optional. For example an application may only report line numbers.
